subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Robin Soderling advanced to his second consecutive ATP final, beating Radek Stepanek, 7-6 (2), 6-3, in the Regions Morgan Keegan Championships in Memphis. Soderling will play Steve Darcis, who advanced to his second career ATP final by defeating Jonas Bjorkman, 4-6, 6-1, 6-4.
